about_the_game:
Hardenville: The Prologue and Episode 1 Are Now Available!

Tequila and weddings: name a more iconic duo. Already three sheets to the wind, you awake on the beach to the sight of Millie, just moments before a very special occasion where you're expected to make a special speech. Guess that last shot wasn't such a good idea, was it?

You control the narrative as Jack, a 21-year-old guy with no confidence, struggling to find his way in life. Follow along on his journey as your choices mold the man he will become in Hardenville - a story filled with romance, humor, depression, and erotica.

Personalize your name, the names of those closest to you, and define your relationships with them. This adult visual novel will offer branching choices and multiple storylines in future updates.

The current version provides around 2 hours of linear gameplay, giving you a taste of what’s to come!

What is Hardenville?

Hardenville is an adult visual novel available for Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Immerse yourself in the story of a young man's coming-of-age, evolving into the man he will become in Hardenville. Your choices will shape the man he becomes as you guide him through a unique story filled with love, drama, and personal growth.

Game Features

  • Stunning Illustrations: Experience gorgeous visuals rendered in 4k.

  • Compelling Storylines: Explore a world rich with drama, romance, and deep emotions.

  • Mature Themes: Delve into adult themes such as sex and nudity (all characters depicted are 18+).

  • Early Access Content: The Prologue and Episode 1 lay the foundation for future episodes, with each aiming for 750 to 1,000 images and 10 to 25 animations, providing substantial content.

One-time Purchase

Buy Hardenville today and receive all future updates for Season 1.

Planned Release Schedule

  • Hardenville: The Prologue: Available Now

  • Hardenville Episode 1: Available Now

  • Hardenville Episode 2: 2025

  • Hardenville Episode 3: TBA

  • Hardenville Episode 4: TBA

  • Hardenville Episode 5: TBA

  • Hardenville Episode 6: TBA

  • Hardenville Episode 7: TBA

  • Hardenville Episode 8: TBA

  • Hardenville Episode 9: TBA

Excluded from Hardenville

NTR

What's Under the Hood?

Hardenville is built using Daz Studio and Ren'Py, creating and interactive narrative featuring top-tier visual design. Static images are rendered in 4k, while animations are created in 1080p and upscaled to 4k for an immersive experience.

Join Our Discord Community

Visit the store page for the link to join our Discord server.

content_descriptors.notes:
Please be aware that the narrative, events, and all characters featured in the game are entirely fictional creations, with each character depicted as being at least 18 years of age.

The current version of Hardenville (Episode 1) includes scenes involving kissing, nudity, oral sex, masturbation, explicit language, and moderate alcohol use.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit
